MS MCQs

    Disaster recovery and backup - Backup services

    »

    1. The primary goal of cloud-based backup services is to:

      Prevent disruptions in service by failing over to a secondary virtual machine when a primary virtual machine fails

      Prevent disruptions in service by failing over to a secondary database when a primary database fails

      Prevent data loss by backing up virtual machines and other resources that store data

      Prevent data loss by backing up cloud resources to on-premises resources
